nodes.text: The Tosste Spur was a trade route that branched off from the Rimma Trade Route. The Outer Rim Territories planet Mustafar in the Atravis sector's Mustafar system was part of the route.

The Tosste Spur was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2015 magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 17. The route originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
